definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

sentences.english: Our certificates are made valid with the official seal.
sentences.chinese: 我们的证明书以盖公章有效。

sentences.english: Personal seals of the persons in charge should also be protected as official seals.
sentences.chinese: 负责人的私章有时也需要和公章同样保护。

sentences.english: Income proof must build official seal.
sentences.chinese: 收入证实是一定要盖公章的。

sentences.english: The contract was signed by authorized representatives of both parties and the date stamp.
sentences.chinese: 本合同于双方授权代表签字并加盖公章之日起生效。

sentences.english: Copies of documents Party B provides shall be affixed with Party B's official seal.
sentences.chinese: 乙方提供的文件为复印件的，必须加盖乙方公章。

sentences.english: Please affix a seal to the letter of attorney on the trademark.
sentences.chinese: 请在商标的委任状上加盖公章。

sentences.english: We'll improve the quality of our products and production efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 我们的质量证实书盖公章方为有效。

sentences.english: Our quality certificate is made valid by means of official seal.
sentences.chinese: 我们的质量证书盖了公章方为有效。

sentences.english: Please go to the financial department to stamp the company's seal after finishing writing the materials.
sentences.chinese: 材料写好后，请到财务处加盖公司的公章。

sentences.english: Our Certificate of Quality is made valid by means of the official seal。
sentences.chinese: 我们的质量证明书盖公章方为有效。

sentences.english: Our Certificate of Quality is made valid by means of the official seal.
sentences.chinese: 我们的质量证实书盖公章方为有用。

sentences.english: One type of ballot was merely a blank piece of paper with the seal of The village office chopped on it.
sentences.chinese: 有一种选票只是一张盖着村公所公章的空白纸。

sentences.english: Our certificate is valid by means of official seal and personal chop of the commissioner.
sentences.chinese: 我们的证明书以盖公章和局长签字为有效。

sentences.english: Because there is no official seal of , only the signatures.
sentences.chinese: 因为没有公章的，只有签名。

sentences.english: Our of Quality is made valid by means of the official seal.
sentences.chinese: 咱们的质量证实书盖公章方为有效果。

sentences.english: Hydrants must be covered by seals on which there are dates and chops from the factory.
sentences.chinese: 消防栓要加封条，封条写上日期加盖工厂公章。

definition: to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)/to sign off on sth
seal impression/stamp/mark from a seal serving as signature
